SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into t_invest (id, time, user_id, bid_id, amount, correct_amount, correct_interest, loan_service_fee_divide, loan_service_fee_divide_left, loan_service_fee_divide_right, client, transfer_status, debt_id, service_order_no, trust_order_no, invest_type, red_packet_amount, red_packet_id, rate_id, rate_amount, is_use_rate, project_invest_id, project_user_id, project_invest_type, project_repeat_id, out_id, is_resolution) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{bidId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{correctAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{correctInterest,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{loanServiceFeeDivide,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{loanServiceFeeDivideLeft,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{loanServiceFeeDivideRight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{client,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{transferStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{debtId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{serviceOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trustOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{investType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{redPacketAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{redPacketId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{rateId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{rateAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{isUseRate,jdbcType=BIT}, #{projectInvestId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{projectUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{projectInvestType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{projectRepeatId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{outId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{isResolution,jdbcType=BIT})
